author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Ambitious & insightful, James Islington’s The Will of the Many is a dark academia book with a lot of heart and a lot of rage. Cutthroat characters, an intense setting, and a very cool magic system, The Will of the Many is the best school setting since Name of the Wind and threatens to be […]

The post REVIEW: The Will of the Many by James Islington appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Will of the Many by James Islington
